Summary: We saw a flat pancake type bright reflective object.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Huntley
There were no other sightings in Huntley on or around August 18th 2012
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving west bound Lake in the Hills, we saw a flat pancake type bright reflective object in front of us about 4 miles out. Object was below clouds hovering, then moving south very slowly, maybe 50 mph, appeared to be about 200-300 feet across... while we were starring at it, realizing it was NOT an airplane, it faded away and disapeared...
